casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brian Keith HUGHES 169P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2019 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for Hughes, Brian Keith. Yvonne B. Ricci, Assistant Attorney General, Greg Newman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of May 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2019."
